name: Stunts Contest Monster Car
description:
It`s time to have some fun together.

Stunts Contest : Monster Car presents a funny racing game that involves adrenaline and courage. In this game you will perform all kinds of stunts (jumps, 360 degree turns, avoidance of obstacles when car rush).

You will have at your disposal a real fleet of monster cars. The last one is a Cyber Monster Car, which we prepared for you like the cherry on the cake. Be careful, such stunts can cost you your life. Drive carefully and HAVE FUN !
Game features :
- Multiple dangerous levels
- 9 Monster Trucks
- Daily Bonus
